nodes.text: The Candovantans or Candovants, were a sentient species from the planet Candovant.[source?] The Candovantan race possessed reddish-brown skin and dark eyes that were capable of seeing in the ultraviolet spectrum. They had flattened faces with small mouths and no visible nose.[source?] Zizi Tlo, a female Resistance pilot, was a member of this species, as was New Republic Senator Zygli Bruss.
